commits.author: Dawid Weiss
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Called on each token UTF-16 code unit to normalize it before it is added to the * token. The default implementation does nothing. Subclasses may use this to, * e.g., lowercase tokens. *

* Note: This method cannot handle supplementary characters. To support all Unicode characters, including * supplementary characters, use the {@link #normalize(int)} method. *

* * @deprecated use {@link #normalize(int)} instead. This method will be * removed in Lucene 4.0. */ @Deprecated protected char normalize(char c) { return (char) normalize((int) c); }

* * @deprecated use {@link #normalize(int)} instead. This method will be * removed in Lucene 4.0. */ @Deprecated protected char normalize(char c) { return (char) normalize((int) c); }
